Right now if clippy fails to apply a --fix (cargo clippy --fix -Zunstable-options) lint suggestion, it does not make the build stop, and it does not even force a bad exit status.
Is this intended? Has this always been the case?
personally I like this behavior because clippy has so many bugs when running on rustc :laughing:
but I don't feel strongly about it - it would be nice to have --no-fail-fast or something though
